title: H.M.S. Pinafore
brief_description: Gilbert and Sullivan’s rollicking tale of love upon the high seas. Stars Peter Marshall as Captain Corcoran and Frankie Howard as Sir Joseph Porter. With the London Symphony Orchestra and the Ambrosian Opera Chorus. Rated: G
